main event: Three circular silvery objects were observed moving side to side over Bedford, Indiana on 8 January 1956.
interesting points: The length of the observation was 2 hours and 34 minutes., The objects were described as circular and silvery., No positional information was obtained during the sighting., Fighter pilots in the area did not visually confirm the UFO but saw a Piper Cub aircraft., The report indicates that the sighting was part of an information report but lacks a conclusion or case status.
